name: Software Engineering/Development (Full stack)
description: Expertise in the development and maintenance of full-stack web applications, encompassing both micro-frontends and micro-services, ensuring robust performance in production environments.

name: Quality Assurance
description: Launching my career as a QA engineer in 2017, I took an active role in test planning, manual test execution, and the creation of high-quality automated tests. My efforts led to the development of a considerable number of test cases that identified critical software vulnerabilities.

name: Leadership
description: Actively led software architectural discussions, placing significant emphasis on development best practices. I steered pivotal initiatives in test planning and orchestrated test runs. My leadership was further manifested through guiding sprint planning and shaping user stories to clearly define the scope of work.

name: Software Development Life Cycle
description: Engaged in all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) from planning to deployment. At each phase, I actively contributed to ensuring the delivered software met high-quality standards with minimal issues for customers.

name: Reporting
description: Documented all architectural choices both within the code and in external documents, ensuring clarity and comprehensibility even for individuals unfamiliar with the subject.

name: Time Management
description: In my professional journey, I've emphasized time management across all SDLC phases. From leading architectural dialogues to ensuring accessible documentation, I've optimized processes to deliver high-quality software efficiently and streamline onboarding, maximizing time and resources.
